Modals (pop-up windows)

Modals (pop-up windows)

Alert the user to information they need to know at that point in time with a pop-up window.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts

Visual design

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Modal title

CSS styles

Desktop & mobile

Title
h4 {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Paragraph
p {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Close icon
.icon-close {
    color: #254F90;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
}
Container
div {
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    border-top: 4px solid #254F90;
    padding: 32px;
    border-radius: 0;
}
